faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about our digital solutions and AI automation services

one.question: What do you need from me to get started?

answer.intro: Once you hire us, we'll start with a discovery call to understand your needs, goals, and current challenges. We'll walk you through our process, timeline, and what to expect at each milestone.
answer.process: During this session, we'll identify what information and resources we'll need from you to deliver the best possible solution.
answer.item1: Your business goals and success metrics
answer.item2: Current tools, systems, or processes you're using
answer.item4: Examples of what you like (competitors, references, inspiration)
answer.item5: Any existing content, data, or workflows
answer.conclusion: After gathering this information, we'll create a detailed project plan, finalize the agreement, and officially begin your project.

answer.intro: We use different technology stacks optimized for each service:
answer.summary: We select the best tools for your specific project requirements to ensure optimal performance and scalability.

answer.intro: We price every engagement around the outcome you need. No surprise line items or hourly guesswork.
answer.description: Most founders kick off with our Standard Website plan at $1,500. It delivers up to 5 conversion-focused pages, mobile + SEO optimization, an AI chatbot with calendar booking, a full CMS, and six months of managed hosting with two weeks of launch support. When you need deeper automations, advanced integrations, or enterprise scale, we simply step you into our Premium and Enterprise tiers with the same transparent pricing.
answer.cta: Want the full breakdown? <link>See the pricing section for plan-by-plan details.</link>
answer.priceDescription: Standard plan: up to 5 pages, mobile & SEO optimization, AI chatbot + booking, CMS, 6 months hosting, 2-week launch support

four.question: What if I don't like the final result?

answer.intro: We have a comprehensive revision process that allows you to provide feedback on our work to ensure you love the final result. We'll keep revising until you're completely satisfied.
answer.description: As design and functionality preferences are subjective, it may take a few iterations to perfectly match your vision. Our commitment is to deliver work you'll love, not just complete a task.
answer.commitment: We'll keep working with you through revisions until you're completely satisfied with your project.

answer.intro: We structure our payments in three phases to align with project milestones:

phase3.title: 25% Final Payment
phase3.description: After development is complete and you've approved the final deliverable

answer.paymentMethods: We accept multiple payment methods, including credit card, PayPal, and wire transfer.

answer.intro: We're unable to offer refunds as we dedicate significant time and resources to each project to ensure you receive the highest quality solution possible.
answer.item2: Unlimited feedback rounds until you're satisfied
answer.item3: Collaborative approach to match your style
answer.commitment: As design is subjective, it may take a few versions to match your style. My commitment is to provide work you'll love, not just complete a task.

seven.question: What if there are changes after project delivery?

answer.intro: We offer all clients 2 weeks of complimentary support to make any needed updates or adjustments to your solution.
answer.note: During this period, we'll also take care of fixing any unexpected bugs that may arise.

cta.description: Still have questions? We're here to help.

header.mainTitle: How We Fill Your Clinic With Patients
header.subtitle: A proven 4-step system designed specifically for integrative health practices. We handle the marketing so you can focus on patient care.

planning.title: Clinic Audit & Strategy
planning.description: We analyze your clinic's current marketing, patient demographics, and growth opportunities to create a custom acquisition strategy tailored to integrative medicine.

branding.title: Website & Funnel Build
branding.description: We design a conversion-optimized website and patient booking funnel that positions your clinic as the premier integrative health destination in your area.

feedback.title: Launch Patient Acquisition
feedback.description: We activate targeted ad campaigns across Google, Facebook, and Instagram to reach health-conscious patients actively seeking integrative care in your market.

launch.title: Scale & Optimize
launch.description: We continuously optimize your campaigns, scale what works, and implement retention systems to maximize patient lifetime value and referrals.

enterprise.description: Your expertise is integrative medicine. Ours is filling your schedule with high-quality patients who value holistic care. Let's work together.
